verses.text: O make \w a|strong="H1121"\w* glad noise \w with|strong="H7141"\w* \w your|strong="H1121"\w* hands, all you peoples; letting \w your|strong="H1121"\w* voices go \w up|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* God \w with|strong="H7141"\w* joy.

\w For|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord Most High \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w to|strong="H0430"\w* \w be|strong="H0430"\w* feared; \w he|strong="H0430"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w a|strong="H8628"\w* \w great|strong="H0430"\w* King \w over|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* put \w down|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* peoples \w under|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H0776"\w* \w under|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* feet.

\w He|strong="H1696"\w* \w will|strong="H7272"\w* \w give|strong="H1696"\w* \w us|strong="H8478"\w* \w our|strong="H5971"\w* heritage, \w the|strong="H8478"\w* glory \w of|strong="H8478"\w* Jacob who \w is|strong="H1696"\w* dear \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H8478"\w*. (Selah.)

God \w has|strong="H0834"\w* gone \w up|strong="H0853"\w* \w with|strong="H5159"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* glad cry, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord \w with|strong="H5159"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sound \w of|strong="H5159"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* horn.

\w Give|strong="H5927"\w* \w praises|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, make songs \w of|strong="H0430"\w* praise; \w give|strong="H5927"\w* \w praises|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* King, make songs \w of|strong="H0430"\w* praise.

\w For|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0430"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* all \w the|strong="H0430"\w* earth; make songs \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w praise|strong="H2167"\w* \w with|strong="H0430"\w* knowledge.

\w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ruler \w over|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H0776"\w*; \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w on|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* high seat \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* holy \w rule|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w rulers|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* peoples \w have|strong="H1471"\w* come \w together|strong="H5921"\w*, \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H1471"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Abraham; \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* powers \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* earth \w are|strong="H0430"\w* God's: \w he|strong="H0430"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* lifted \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w high|strong="H1471"\w*.
